title: FTP and SSH Misconfiguration Extravaganza
description: Explore vulnerabilities in FTP and SSH configurations to solve this challenge.
hints: Check the FTP server for anonymous access.
Explore what configurations are set for SSH.
Try using common usernames and passwords for SSH.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP server configurations and common pitfalls.
Learn about SSH misconfigurations and how they can be exploited.
